00042 #ifndef DYNAMIC_WATCHED_AND_NEW_H
00043 #define DYNAMIC_WATCHED_AND_NEW_H
00044 
00045 #include "../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00046 #include "../memory_management/reversible_vals.h"

00055 
00056 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl
00057 #define P(x)
00058 
00059 // Similar to watched or, but has no watching phase, just propagates all
00060 // the time, and propagates all constraints of course.
00061 
00062 
00063 struct Dynamic_AND : public ParentConstraint
00064 {
00065   virtual string constraint_name()
00066     { return "Dynamic AND:"; }
00067 
00068     
00069   Reversible<bool> full_propagate_called;
00070   bool constraint_locked;
00071   
00072   Dynamic_AND(StateObj* _stateObj, vector<AbstractConstraint*> _con) : 
00073     ParentConstraint(_stateObj, _con), full_propagate_called(_stateObj, false), constraint_locked(false)
00074     { }
00075 
00076   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00077   {
00078     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00079     {
00080       if(! child_constraints[i]->check_assignment(v + start_of_constraint[i],
00081          child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton()->size()))
00082          return false;
00083     }
00084     return true;
00085   }
00086   
00087   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00088   {
00089       // get all satisfying assignments of child constraints and stick
00090       // them together. Even if they contradict each other.
00091       typedef pair<int,DomainInt> temptype;
00092       MAKE_STACK_BOX(localassignment, temptype, assignment.capacity());
00093       
00094       for(int i=0; i<child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00095       {
00096           localassignment.clear();
00097           bool flag=child_constraints[i]->get_satisfying_assignment(localassignment);
00098           if(!flag)
00099           {
00100               return false;
00101           }
00102           
00103           for(int j=0; j<localassignment.size(); j++)
00104           {
00105               assignment.push_back(make_pair(localassignment[j].first+start_of_constraint[i],
00106                   localassignment[j].second));
00107           }
00108       }
00109       return true;
00110   }
00111   
00112   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00113   { 
00114     vector<AnyVarRef> vecs;
00115     for(int i = 0; i < child_constraints.size(); ++i)
00116     {
00117       vector<AnyVarRef>* var_ptr = child_constraints[i]->get_vars_singleton(); 
00118       vecs.insert(vecs.end(), var_ptr->begin(), var_ptr->end());
00119     }
00120     return vecs;
00121   }
00122   
00123   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count()
00124   { 
00125     return 0;
00126   }
00127 
00128   virtual void special_check()
00129   {
00130     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00131     constraint_locked = false;
00132     P("Full propagating all constraints in AND");
00133     for(int i=0; i<child_constraints.size(); i++)
00134     {
00135         child_constraints[i]->full_propagate();
00136     }
00137     full_propagate_called = true;
00138   }
00139 
00140   virtual void special_unlock()
00141   {
00142     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00143     constraint_locked = false;
00144   }
00145   
00146   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta domain)
00147   {
00148     //PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchedOR);
00149     P("Static propagate start");
00150     if(constraint_locked)
00151       return;
00152 
00153     if(full_propagate_called)
00154     {
00155       pair<int,int> childTrigger = getChildStaticTrigger(i);
00156       P("Got trigger: " << i << ", maps to: " << childTrigger.first << "." << childTrigger.second);
00157       P("Passing trigger" << childTrigger.second << "on");
00158       child_constraints[childTrigger.first]->propagate(childTrigger.second, domain);
00159     }
00160     else
00161     {
00162         // add to the special queue so it can be full_propagated later.
00163         constraint_locked = true;
00164         getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00165     }
00166   }
00167   
00168   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* trig)
00169   {
00170     //PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchedOr);
00171     P("Prop");
00172     P("FullProp: " << (bool)full_propagate_called);
00173     P("Locked:" << constraint_locked);
00174     if(constraint_locked)
00175       return;
00176     
00177       if(!full_propagate_called)
00178       {
00179           // how did we get here?
00180           constraint_locked = true;
00181             getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00182             return;
00183       }
00184   
00185     // pass the trigger down
00186     P("Propagating child");
00187     // need to know which child to prop.
00188     int child = getChildDynamicTrigger(trig);
00189     child_constraints[child]->propagate(trig);
00190   }
00191   
00192   virtual void full_propagate()
00193   {
00194     P("Full Propagate");
00195     
00196     // push it on the special queue to be full_propagated later.
00197     D_ASSERT(!constraint_locked);
00198     constraint_locked = true;
00199     getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00200   }
00201   
00202   // This breaks everything.
00203   //virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint();
00204 };
00205

00211   for(int i=0; i<child_constraints.size(); i++)
00212   {
00213       con.push_back(child_constraints[i]->reverse_constraint());
00214   }
00215   return new Dynamic_OR(stateObj, con);
00216 }*/
00217 
00218 inline AbstractConstraint*
00219 BuildCT_WATCHED_NEW_AND(StateObj* stateObj, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00220 {
00221   vector<AbstractConstraint*> cons;
00222   for(int i = 0; i < bl.internal_constraints.size(); ++i)
00223     cons.push_back(build_constraint(stateObj, bl.internal_constraints[i]));
00224 
00225   return new Dynamic_AND(stateObj, cons);
00226 }
